subject: New Sales IM Testing Contests - $5,400 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

TopCoder is excited to announce three new Sales IM testing competitions with $5,400 in prize money. Each of these contests will focus on implementing test cases for specific areas of the Sales IM application that is currently in assembly.  The Sales IM tool is a web based instant messaging application.

The winning submission in each competition will receive $1,200, while the second place team will receive $600. Contest details can be found here: 

http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=dev&d2=testing&d3=activeContests

Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified either of new TopCoder development opportunities or TopCoder news & events. If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'. In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails. Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
